title: Updated, Stainless Steel, Wood Flooring, Granite, Attached Garage!
posting_body: Apartment Homes are Tailored to Fit Your Unique Taste and Style by Offering Eleven Well-Appointed Floor Plans featuring an Open Concept, Renovated Interiors with Stainless Steel Appliances, Wood-Style Flooring and Granite Counters.
Community Amenities Include a State Of The Art Fitness Center, Resort Style Pool and Spa, Playground and So Much More.
Select Floor Plans Feature Direct Garage Access or Reserved Covered Parking.
Enjoy Life Within this Inspired Neighborhood, Convenient to Everything Plano Has to Offer.
Our Community Borders Watters Creek Golf Course for Pristine Views.
You'll Be Blocks Away From Specialty Shops, Eateries and Entertainment.
We are Located off Highway 75, Highway 121 and George Bush Turnpike Making it an Easy Commute.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Apartment Locators
